title: Doctor executor
description: Wrapper for the Clinic js Doctor tool

buildTarget.description: The project's build target to run bubbleprof on

detectPort.description: If set to true, the executor will try to detect the port of the running server

debug.description: If set to true, the generated html will not be minified

dest.description: The folder where the collected data is stored

name.description: The name to identify the collected data

visualizeOnly.description: Path of the report to visualize

collectDelay.description: The time in ms to wait before starting to collect data

sampleInterval.description: The time in ms between each sample
